content:
Hello,

Well, I finally got Zulip up and running, and I've even got email going! Yay!

Question about adding users...a few of the users are employees who do not have email accounts with the business (they are clinical staff with no reason for them to have emails). Is possible to make users without email addresses? I tried via manage.py, but it asks for an email.
@Matt Hall An email address is required for every user. Can't they sign up with their normal addresses, be it @gmail.com or whatever they have?

@Mateusz Mandera Yes, I guess that works. I suppose my concern with that is, if we let people go, then they still have an inroad to the business. I guess this worry is not really realistic, since I can simply remove them as users from Zulip, right?
@Matt Hall Yes exactly, you can just deactivate their accounts.
